productName: SOHL Mattress with Latex and Memory Foam Comfort Layers - Queen Size
productTitle: SOHL Mattress with Latex and Memory Foam Comfort Layers - Queen Size
productDesc: A good quality mattress can provide you with the comfortable night's sleep you deserve, leaving you rested for the day ahead. This queen size mattress features latex and memory foam layers giving you support and comfort while you sleep. A conveniently removable and washable cover helps keep your mattress fresher for longer.
productDetailedDesc:
Features Latex and Memory Foam comfort layers
-Comfort level: medium feel
-Removable and washable cover
-Mattress expands to full size once unpacked (cannot be repacked into box)
-Includes 12 month warranty
-Standard Australian queen size mattress
-Assembled size: 203cm(L) x 152cm(W) x 22cm(H)
-Box Size: approx. 158cm(W) x 32.5cm(D) x 32.5cm(H)
-Box Weight: approx. 25kg
productWarrantyDesc: 1 Year Warranty. This product warranty is guaranteed for a period of 1 year
productDeliveryReturnsDesc:
Delivery

Currently delivering to selected postcodes in NSW, VIC & QLD. Your order will be dispatched within 1-2 business days and you will receive order updates via email with tracking details.


Returns

While we hope you'll be happy with your order, you can return a product to your nearest store or contact us via email to arrange. To check if you are eligible for a refund please refer to our Returns Policy.
